CONTENT: 見たくない　では 読みます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No quiero leerlo. -Se lo leeré yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't want to read it. Then I'll read it for you.

CONTENT: "ミオリネ"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: "Miorine,

CONTENT: "学校は退学させる" は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm unenrolling you from the school."

CONTENT: "花婿も こちらで用意する すぐに戻ってこい"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te buscaré un novio personalmente. Regresa de inmediato".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: "I'll arrange a groom myself. Return immediately."

CONTENT: はあ? 以上です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? That's all.

CONTENT: 貸して! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Give me that!

CONTENT: なんなの これ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the hell is this?

CONTENT: 決闘で結婚相手を選ぶって あんたが決めたくせに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Fuiste tú quien decidió que se escogería a mi prometido con los duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It was you who decided that my fiance would be selected through duels.

CONTENT: 決闘で勝ったのはスレッタよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta's the one who won the duel!

CONTENT: クソ親父が用意した男なんかと 絶対 結婚しないから!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No me casaré con un hombre que elija ese estúpido!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No man chosen by that jerk will be a husband of mine!

CONTENT: 私に言われましても...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que me lo diga a mí es inútil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's no use saying that to me.

CONTENT: あいつは いつもそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He's always like this.

CONTENT: 相談しない 説明しない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca me consulta nada ni me explica nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He never consults me, he never explains...

CONTENT: この学園に入ったのも　ピアノをやめさせられたのも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como al apuntarme a esta escuela u obligarme a abandonar el piano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whether it's enrolling me at this school or forcing me to quit piano.

CONTENT: 友達さえも勝手に決めて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O decidir quiénes son mis amistades.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or deciding who I should be friends with.

CONTENT: お母さんのお葬式だって!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even my own mother's funeral!

CONTENT: どちらへ!　トイレ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where are you going? To the bathroom!

CONTENT: チッ ミオリネさまから目を離すなよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No pierdas de vista a la señorita Miorine.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't let Mistress Miorine out of your sight.

CONTENT: 死ね死ね死ね死ね死ね死ね...　は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Die, die, die, die...

CONTENT: ミオリネ・レンブランさんですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú has de ser Miorine Rembran.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You must be Ms. Miorine Rembran.

CONTENT: コロニー指定座標 XY72Z53
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Designated Colony Coordinate XY72Z53.

CONTENT: それって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's...

CONTENT: 脱出の合流地点...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: el punto de encuentro de mi huida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the rendezvous point for my escape!

CONTENT: 対面では はじめまして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me alegro de verte en persona al fin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's nice to finally meet you in person.

CONTENT: 先日 お見えにならなかったので 様子を見に参りまして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No apareciste el otro día, así que vine a buscarte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You didn't show up to meet us the other day, so I came to check on you.

CONTENT: アフターケアも万全てわけね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this some sort of after-sales care?

CONTENT: 料金は いただいてますから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You did pay us, after all.

CONTENT: もし ご意志に 変わりがないようでしたら⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you haven't changed your mind,

CONTENT: 今から脱出なさいますか?　え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: would you like to escape now? What?

CONTENT: 今なら ご希望どおり 地球にお送りできます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si actuamos ahora, puedo enviarte a la Tierra como deseas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we act now, I can send you to Earth as you desire.

CONTENT: 地球へ!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: To Earth?!

CONTENT: でも...　猶予は30分です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... I can wait for 30 minutes.

CONTENT: 後悔のない決断を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Toma una decisión que no lamentes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Make a decision you won't regret.

CONTENT: 行く ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll go. What?

CONTENT: 私をここから連れ出して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Has de sacarme de aquí como sea.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've gotta get me out of here!

CONTENT: こんなにあっさり...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it really this easy?

CONTENT: タイミングですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's all about timing.

CONTENT: 管制官が我々の協力者だったのも 私とあなたが出会えたのも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El controlador del puerto era un colaborador nuestro y luego nos conocimos nosotras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're lucky the spaceport controller was a collaborator of ours, and then you and I happened to meet.

CONTENT: 5分後に フロント港管制区域から出ます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dejaremos el espacio aéreo controlado en cinco minutos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll be leaving the airspace controlled by this port in 5 minutes.

CONTENT: そうなったら進路変更はできません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando lo hagamos, no podremos cambiar de rumbo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once we do, we can't change our course.

CONTENT: よろしいですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you sure?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes.

CONTENT: もう決めたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've made up my mind.

CONTENT: ミオリネさまが また失踪したと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La señorita Miorine desapareció de nuevo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mistress Miorine has disappeared again.

CONTENT: 見張りは何をしていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about the men watching her?

CONTENT: まかれたようです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She shook them off.

CONTENT: 港を封鎖させますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shall we seal the port?

CONTENT: 出入管理局に網を張らせろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que los de Inmigración liberen una red.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Have the immigration authorities spread a dragnet.

CONTENT: 行き先は どうせ地球だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sé que irá a la Tierra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know she's bound for Earth, anyway.

CONTENT: それより審問会は どうなっている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: More importantly, when will the inquiry begin?

CONTENT: 先ほど シン・セー代表の 入港を確認しました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Confirmamos la llegada del representante de Shin Sei.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've just confirmed the arrival of the Shin Sei representative.

CONTENT: ハア そうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: ジェターク家の人間が⸺　ジェターク社の モビルスーツを使って負けただと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Un Jeturk perdió un duelo en un Mobile Suit de los Jeturk?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So a member of the Jeturk family lost a duel in a Jeturk mobile suit?

CONTENT: お前は会社の信用を潰す気か!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres hundir la reputación de la empresa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you trying to destroy the company's reputation?

CONTENT: 申し訳ありません 父さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Forgive me, Dad.

CONTENT: 今回の決闘は 俺のほうで無効にしてやる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esta vez haré que anulen el resultado del duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This time around, I'll arrange to have the duel result voided.

CONTENT: これ以上 恥をかかせるな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't embarrass me again!

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes.

CONTENT: CEO ご来客です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have a visitor, sir.

CONTENT: 誰だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who is it? It's...

CONTENT: それが シン・セー開発公社の代表でして...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The representative of the Shin Sei Development Corporation.

CONTENT: なに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: ご無沙汰しております　ジェタークCEO
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's been a while, Mr. Jeturk.

CONTENT: 3年前の社長就任以来だったか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No nos veíamos desde hace tres años, cuando te nombraron presidenta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We haven't seen each other for 3 years since your appointment as president.

CONTENT: レディ・プロスペラ　はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lady Prospera. That's right.

CONTENT: 総裁にとりなしてくれという話なら 受け入れんぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si quieres que hable con el presidente por ti, mi respuesta es no.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you want me to talk to the President on your behalf, the answer is no.

CONTENT: いいえ その逆です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En absoluto. Es justo al contrario.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not at all. The opposite, in fact.

CONTENT: なに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: そちらが私に 頼むのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres tú quien me pedirá a mí un favor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's you who should ask me for a favor.

CONTENT: お母さん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mom...

CONTENT: は... ははは... はい!　お腹空いてない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes? Aren't you hungry?

CONTENT: え... えっと...　僕はエラン・ケレス
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My name's Elan Ceres.

CONTENT: 君と同じアスティカシアの学生だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al igual que tú, estudio en Asticassia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like you, I'm a student at Asticassia.

CONTENT: 係りの人に代わってもらった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El guardia me dejó hacer su trabajo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The guard here let me do his job.

CONTENT: う... いいんですか?　どうぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it really okay? Go ahead.

CONTENT: い... ただく... きます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's so nice of you.

CONTENT: あ... あの...　ありがとう... ございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you very much.

CONTENT: どういたしまして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're welcome.

CONTENT: その...　どうして...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why would you...

CONTENT: 君に興味があったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You interest me.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury...

CONTENT: 君のことを もっと知りたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'd like to learn more about you.

CONTENT: これより 審問会を始めます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We will now begin the inquiry.

CONTENT: シン・セー開発公社代表　レディ・プロスペラに問う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Señora Prospera, representante de Shin Sei.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lady Prospera, representative of the Shin Sei Development Corporation.

CONTENT: お前は魔女か?　いいえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you a witch? No.

CONTENT: ヴァナディース機関との⸺　つながりはあるのか?　いいえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you have ties to the Vanadis Institute? No.

CONTENT: では どうやってガンダムを作った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then how did you build a Gundam?

CONTENT: エアリアルは ガンダムではありません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El Aerial no es un Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Aerial is not a Gundam.

CONTENT: 我々 シン・セーが開発した　新型ドローン技術です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un producto de la última tecnología de Shin Sei en drones.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a product of Shin Sei's newly developed drone technology.

CONTENT: 新型だと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? Did she say drone?

CONTENT: シャディク　はい 義父さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shaddiq. Yes, Father.

CONTENT: 先の決闘において あの機体は⸺　パーメット流入値の 基準を超えていました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Durante el duelo, los valores de Permet de la máquina superaron los estándares.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: During the duel, that machine's Permet influx values exceeded the standards.

CONTENT: これはガンダムの基幹システム⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is a unique characteristic

CONTENT: GUNDフォーマットの 特徴を表しています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: del GUND Format, el núcleo de todos los Gundams.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: of the GUND Format, the core system of all Gundams.

CONTENT: もし あれに⸺　GUNDフォーマットが 搭載されているとすれば⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si esa máquina fuera equipada con el GUND Format,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If that machine is equipped with the GUND Format,

CONTENT: データストームが検出されるはず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: habrían detectado una tormenta de datos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you should also have detected a data storm.

CONTENT: いかがです?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well?

CONTENT: 検出はされていません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There was none detected.

CONTENT: 従来のパーメットリンクを基にした 操作技術です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El sistema de control se basa en un enlace Permet convencional,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Its control system is based on a conventional Permet link.

CONTENT: グループの技術条項にも 沿ったものと自負しています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que cumple con las cláusulas tecnológicas del grupo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm confident that it complies with all of the group's technology provisions.

CONTENT: それだけで ガンダムでないとはいえないわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso no basta para demostrar que no es un Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That alone doesn't prove it isn't a Gundam.

CONTENT: ですが 断言もできません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tampoco se puede demostrar que lo sea.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't prove that it is, either.

CONTENT: レディ・プロスペラ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lady Prospera...

CONTENT: あなたは ただ エビデンスの欠落部分を⸺　言い訳にしているだけだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estás usando como excusa la falta de pruebas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You are merely using the lack of evidence as an excuse.

CONTENT: 黒を白と言い張るつもりかね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres decirnos que lo blanco es negro?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you trying to tell us that black is white?

CONTENT: 我々も末席とはいえ ベネリットグループの一員です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Somos de las empresas menores, pero estamos en el Benerit Group.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're one of the smallest, but still a member of the Benerit Group.

CONTENT: カテドラルの協約も もちろん存じております
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y somos conscientes del Acuerdo de Cathedra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We are, of course, aware of the Cathedra Agreement.

CONTENT: ご信用いただきたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I ask for your trust.

CONTENT: その風体で信じろとでも?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puedo evitar dudar al verte vestida así.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't help doubting when you come dressed like that.

CONTENT: この腕も⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This arm,

CONTENT: 仮面の下の顔も⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y también la cara que oculta la máscara,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: as well as the face behind this mask,

CONTENT: すべて水星の磁場に 持っていかれました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: se perdieron debido al campo magnético de Mercurio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: were both claimed by Mercury's magnetic field.

CONTENT: 水星の環境は過酷です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las condiciones de Mercurio son duras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Environmental conditions on Mercury are severe.

CONTENT: ですが 我々の ドローン技術を応用できれば⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero usando nuestra tecnología de drones,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: However, utilizing our drone technology,

CONTENT: 危険に身をさらすことなく⸺　パーメットの 採掘事業が可能になります
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: podremos obtener Permet sin poner a nadie en peligro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we'll be able to mine for Permet without putting anyone in danger.

CONTENT: どうか エアリアルの開発を 認めてください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Permítannos continuar con el desarrollo del Aerial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please allow us to continue the Aerial's development.

CONTENT: 我々には グループの支援が必要なのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We are in need of the group's support.

CONTENT: いや あれはガンダムだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No. That thing is a Gundam.

CONTENT: なぜでしょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why is that?

CONTENT: 私が そう判断したからだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because I said so.

CONTENT: 異論がある者はいるか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any objections?

CONTENT: 決まりだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then it's settled.

CONTENT: あのモビルスーツは廃棄処分
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nos desharemos de ese Mobile Suit.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The mobile suit shall be disposed of.

CONTENT: 操縦者の生徒は抹消とする　う... ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll get rid of the student pilot.

CONTENT: なんの用だ ミオリネ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you doing here? Miorine...

CONTENT: あんたに一言 言いたくてやってきたの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vine para decirte lo que pienso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came to give you a piece of my mind.

CONTENT: 自分で決めたルールを あとから勝手に変えるな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Si esas reglas las hiciste tú, no pretendas cambiarlas ahora!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you made these rules yourself, you shouldn't change them after the fact!

CONTENT: このダブスタクソ親父!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You hypocritical loser of a father!

CONTENT: 地球に運ぶんじゃなかったのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Que no la llevarías a la Tierra?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Weren't you supposed to take her to Earth?

CONTENT: お客さまの要望には応えないとね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Debo hacer lo que me pidan mis clientes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have to honor my customers' requests.

CONTENT: それに総裁の娘なら⸺　貸しを 作っておいたほうがいいでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y como es la hija del presidente, no está mal que me deba un favor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And when it comes to the President's daughter, it can't hurt to be owed a favor.

CONTENT: 計算づくか フッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As calculating as ever.

CONTENT: 宇宙には 新しいルールが必要よ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Space is in need of new rules.

CONTENT: ここに立てるのは⸺　ベネリットグループの⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los únicos que pueden estar en esta sala
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The only people permitted to stand in this room

CONTENT: それも上位企業の力ある者のみ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: son los líderes de las principales empresas del Benerit Group.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: are the powers-that-be from the top companies of the Benerit Group.

CONTENT: だが お前は違う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But you are different.

CONTENT: なんの力もない ただの学生だ　ん... あんたって いっつもそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo eres una estudiante sin ninguna autoridad para hablar. Siempre haces lo mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You are merely a student with no authority to speak of. It's always the same with you.

CONTENT: 上から目線で 説明もなしに勝手に決める
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Menosprecias y controlas mi vida sin preguntar nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You look down and control my life without asking or explaining.

CONTENT: 説明も相談も必要ない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es necesario consultarte ni explicarte nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Neither consultation nor explanation are necessary.

CONTENT: 私が決める お前は従う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo tomo las decisiones. Y tú obedeces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I decide. You obey.

CONTENT: 娘だからといって 私と対等にものが言えると思ったか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Crees poder replicarme solo porque eres mi hija?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you think you could speak out against me because you're my daughter?

CONTENT: 何それ あんた王さま...　そうだ く...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's your problem?! You're a king? That's right.

CONTENT: 私には力がある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I am vested with power.

CONTENT: お前にはない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have none.

CONTENT: 力のない者は黙って従うのが この世界のルールだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los que no tienen el poder se callan y obedecen. Así es este mundo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The powerless shut their mouths and obey. Those are the rules of our world.

CONTENT: 進めば2つ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you move forward, you gain two...

CONTENT: は... だったら⸺　決闘よ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡En ese caso, te desafío a un duelo!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In that case, I challenge you to a duel!

CONTENT: 私たちが勝ったら⸺　あんたはスレッタを 私の婚約者として認める!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si ganamos, aceptarás a Suletta como mi prometida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we win, you'll accept Suletta as my fiance.

CONTENT: 負けたら好きにすればいい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si perdemos, harás lo que quieras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we lose, you can do as you please!

CONTENT: 私の話が理解できなかったのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Sigues sin entender lo que te digo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Were you unable to comprehend my words?

CONTENT: あんたが決めたルールで 戦ってやるって言ってんのよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm saying that I'll fight according to your rules!

CONTENT: 自分が決めたことくらい 責任持って守りなさいよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Al menos asume el peso de tus propias decisiones!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At least take responsibility for your own decisions!

CONTENT: 大人なんでしょ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're an adult, aren't you?

CONTENT: 意見 よろしいでしょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: May I speak?

CONTENT: 偶然とはいえ⸺　あれは我が社のディランザを 打ち破った機体です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque fuera por casualidad, esa máquina venció a nuestro Dilanza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even if was accidentally, that machine defeated our company's Dilanza.

CONTENT: 今しばらくの運用を 検討してはいかがでしょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Deberíamos darle tiempo para ver qué más puede hacer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Perhaps we should give it time to see what it can do.

CONTENT: どういうことだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do you mean?

CONTENT: 近年の市場では⸺　他社のモビルスーツのシェアが 高まってきています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los Mobile Suits de otras empresas están ganando peso en el mercado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Recently, mobile suits from other companies have made market gains.

CONTENT: あの機体は業績回復の 起爆剤になり得るかと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esa máquina puede ser la clave para recuperar nuestras cifras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That machine could be the key to recovering our market share.

CONTENT: 学園での決闘は⸺　エアリアルの実証試験として 有益と考えます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que los duelos escolares serán una buena prueba para el Aerial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I believe the school duels will be an effective test of the Aerial's abilities.

CONTENT: 機体の技術情報は 提供してくださるのかしら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y nos darás los datos técnicos de la máquina?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And will you provide us with the machine's technical data?

CONTENT: もちろんです　何を勝手に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course. Hold it right there!

CONTENT: カテドラルの協約を破る気か?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you intend to violate the Cathedra Agreement?

CONTENT: 私は反対だ 価値はあるんじゃないか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I object! This is...

CONTENT: 外部へのアナウンスはどうする 倫理の問題だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo se anunciará esto al mundo? -Podría ser valioso. -¿Y la ética?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How will you announce this to the outside world? It could be valuable. This is about ethics!

CONTENT: おおお... お...　スレッタ!　ミオリネさん! あぐ... うう...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta! Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: あああ... あの... するよ 決闘
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you... Let's do it. The duel...

CONTENT: 負けたらエアリアルは廃棄処分! あんたも退学になる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Si pierdes, destruirán el Aerial! ¡Y a ti te expulsarán!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you lose, Aerial will be scrapped! And you'll be expelled!

CONTENT: 絶対 勝って!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have to win!

CONTENT: パーメットリンク 構築
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet link established.

CONTENT: 意志決定拡張AI 接続完了
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: IA de toma de decisiones conectada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Decision Making Extension AI has been connected.

CONTENT: 戦闘空間ネットワークの展開 確認
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Confirmado despliegue de red de combate espacial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Confirming deployment of combat space network.

CONTENT: いつでもどうぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whenever you're ready.
